creditline: Gift of L.J. Bardwell, C.K. Blandin, Anson S. Brooks. Francis A. Chamberlain, Hovey C. Clarke, Edward W. Decker, George P. Douglas, H.F. Douglas, William A. Durst, Frank T. Heffelfinger, E.E. Mitchell, F.E. Murphy, Frank M. Prince, Arthur R. Rogers, John R. Van Derlip, Frederick B. Wells, Charles J. Winton, David N. Winton and Theodore Wold
inscription:
Inscription

[The Life and Good Works of Herschel V. Jones Giver of the Prints in this Room are Commemorated by this Tablet placed here by a Group of His Old Friends]
object_name: The Herschel V. Jones Memorial Tablet
title: The Herschel V. Jones Memorial Tablet
